Awakenings.Name: Starting Tune
Awakenings.Description: Increase final damage by **13%**.

Awakenings.Name: Lingering Note
Awakenings.Description:
Increase final damage by **18%**.
When Purple Bamboo is in the main slot, for every **1** non-altered weapon equipped, increase all elemental damage by **8%**.

Awakenings.Name: Overwatching Blade
Awakenings.Description: Increase final damage by **13%**. When Alabaster Tiger is equipped, for every **1** frost weapon equipped, increase frost damage by **1%**.

Awakenings.Name: Governing Blade
Awakenings.Description:
Increase final damage by **18%**.
When Alabaster Tiger is equipped, gain damage immunity for **4** seconds when using Sword Art: Icy Beckon (unavailable in Apex League). For every **1** frost weapon equipped, increase frost damage by **2%**. When **3** frost weapons are equipped, gain an additional **350** weapon charge after the Wanderer uses any frost weapon skill. After using any frost weapon's skill or discharge other than Alabaster Tiger's, deal additional damage equal to **1,456%** of ATK to nearby targets.

Awakenings.Name: Lotus Dance
Awakenings.Description: After using Whirling, for every **1** flame weapon equipped, increase final damage by **4%** for **30** seconds.

Awakenings.Name: Darkshadow
Awakenings.Description: After using Whirling, for every **1** flame weapon equipped, increase final damage by **9%** for **30** seconds.

Awakenings.Name: Chime
Awakenings.Description: Incoming healing is increased by **15%**.

Awakenings.Name: Deepset
Awakenings.Description: Incoming healing is increased by **30%**.

Awakenings.Name: Bamboo Splints
Awakenings.Description:
Increase final damage by **13%**.
When equipped with **3** volt weapons, increase volt damage by **6%**.

Awakenings.Name: Jade Luster
Awakenings.Description:
Increase final damage by **18%**.
When equipped with **3** volt weapons, increase volt damage by **6%**, and crit rate boost duration is additionally extended by **25** seconds.

Awakenings.Name: Find Oneself
Awakenings.Description:
Increase final damage by **12%**.
The Wanderer's base physical ATK is increased to the highest value out of their physical/flame/frost/volt base ATK. When the main slot weapon is Onyx Tortoise, normal attack damage is increased by **30%**.

Awakenings.Name: Selfless
Awakenings.Description:
Increase final damage by **18%**.
The Wanderer's base physical ATK is increased to the highest value out of their physical/flame/frost/volt base ATK. When the main slot weapon is Onyx Tortoise, normal attack damage is increased by **50%**.

Awakenings.Name: Steady Qi
Awakenings.Description:
Increase final damage by **13%**.
While in the Martial Artist form, additionally increase final damage by **7%**.
While in the Sweeping Force form, for every **1** frost weapon equipped, increase damage dealt via consuming Fighting Spirit by **9%**. When **3** frost weapons are equipped, increase frost damage by **8%**.

Awakenings.Name: Attention
Awakenings.Description:
Increase final damage by **18%**.
While in the Martial Artist form, additionally increase final damage by **7%**.
While in the Sweeping Force form, for every **1** frost weapon equipped, increase damage dealt via consuming Fighting Spirit by **9%**. When **3** frost weapons are equipped, increase frost damage by **8%**.

Awakenings.Name: Counting Ink
Awakenings.Description: Increase final damage by **13%**. When Pine Comet is in the off-hand slot, Sparrow Feather launch frequency increases to **1** per second.

Awakenings.Name: Taking Up the Brush
Awakenings.Description:
Increase final damage by **18%**. When Pine Comet is in the off-hand slot, Sparrow Feather launch frequency increases to **1** per second.
When Sparrow Feather hits and triggers the spreading effect, it additionally spreads Ion Scorch and Cross Burn.
In team play, your damage taken from the aggroed target is reduced by **5%**. When Fortitude Resonance is activated, the damage reduction increases to **8%**.

Awakenings.Name: Synergy
Awakenings.Description: Increase volt damage by **6%** for every **1** volt weapon equipped.

Awakenings.Name: Enlightenment
Awakenings.Description: Increase volt damage by **8%** for every **1** volt weapon equipped. The amount of time that Grayspace Entities are controlled by Seal is increased to **120** seconds.

Awakenings.Name: Gnonno: Ripples
Awakenings.Description: After Exploration Team Strike triggers Total Berserk, increase final damage by **12%** for **30** seconds.

Awakenings.Name: Gnonno: Tidal Wave
Awakenings.Description:
After Exploration Team Strike triggers Total Berserk, increase final damage by **23%** for **30** seconds.
While diving, increase movement speed by **50%**.

Awakenings.Name: Twinkle
Awakenings.Description: Increase final damage by **16%**.

Awakenings.Name: Moon Reflection
Awakenings.Description:
Increase final damage by **18%**.
Scatter Technique Enhancement:
Hydro Focus Enhancement: Increase all elemental damage by **12%**.
Vortex Enhancement: If Moonstar Bracelet is in the main slot, damage caused by Vortex is increased by **30%**.
Torrential Force Enhancement: Increase discharge damage by **12%**.
Maelstrom Enhancement: When dealing physical damage while Maelstrom is in effect, gain an additional final damage boost, up to **33%** (maxes out in **10** seconds).
Aqua Shackles Enhancement: Aqua Prison duration is extended to **5** seconds while Benediction Resonance is active, and Aqua Prison's base resistance reduction is increased to **10%**.
Wellspring Enhancement: Resistance is increased by (Max HP/**100,000**)% while Fortitude Resonance is active, for a maximum of **10%**.

Awakenings.Name: Hoarfrost
Awakenings.Description: After equipping Precious One, increase final damage by **10%**. While using Precious One, increase shatter by **20%**.

Awakenings.Name: Molten Feathers
Awakenings.Description: After equipping Precious One, increase final damage by **15%**. While using Precious One, increase shatter by **45%**.

Awakenings.Name: Raging Fire
Awakenings.Description: During Fortitude Resonance, flame and frost damage received by you and your teammates in the Vermilion Domain is reduced by **16%**.

Awakenings.Name: Towering Flames
Awakenings.Description: During Fortitude Resonance, flame and frost damage received by you and your teammates in the Vermilion Domain is reduced by **24%**, and final damage is increased by **8%**.

Awakenings.Name: Dimension X
Awakenings.Description: Increase final damage by **13%**. Activate by equipping **2** weapons of different elements. Increase final damage by **18%**. Activate by equipping **3** weapons of different elements.

Awakenings.Name: Dimension Z
Awakenings.Description: Increase final damage by **18%**. Activate by equipping **2** weapons of different elements. Increase final damage by **23%**. Activate by equipping **3** weapons of different elements.

Awakenings.Name: Umi: Good Show
Awakenings.Description: Increase final damage by **12%** for **30** seconds whenever Umi uses It's Magic Time. This effect does not stack.

Awakenings.Name: Umi: Grand Performance
Awakenings.Description: Increase final damage by **18%** for **30** seconds whenever Umi uses It's Magic Time. This effect does not stack.

Awakenings.Name: Anisoptera
Awakenings.Description: After successfully using a weapon skill, increase final damage by **13%** for **12** seconds.

Awakenings.Name: Lepidoptera
Awakenings.Description: After successfully using a weapon skill, increase final damage by **18%** for **18** seconds. After Unyielding Wing is advanced to **1** star, receive Alyss's support when using a physical/flame/volt weapon skill in the Chilling Field, summoning Alyss to cast a discharge skill on the field, which is the equivalent of Wanderer casting a discharge skill. The skill that triggers the discharge skill will then be used again afterward.

Awakenings.Name: Gas (boom!)
Awakenings.Description: For every **1** enemy hit by Gas Explosion, increase Clover Cross's damage by **8%** for **20** seconds, stacking up to **2** times.

Awakenings.Name: Gas (boooom!)
Awakenings.Description: For every **1** enemy hit by Gas Explosion, increase Clover Cross's damage by **15%** for **20** seconds, stacking up to **2** times.

Awakenings.Name: Tian Lang: Thunderball
Awakenings.Description: Each use of volt weapon skill or discharge skill gains **1** free dodge attempt, up to **2** attempts. When volt weapon skill and discharge skill are used simultaneously, increase volt damage by **12%** for **8** seconds. This effect cannot be stacked.

Awakenings.Name: Tian Lang: Thunderclap
Awakenings.Description: Each use of volt weapon skill or discharge skill gains **1** free dodge attempt, up to **3** attempts. When volt weapon skill and discharge skill are used simultaneously, increase volt damage by **18%** for **8** seconds. This effect cannot be stacked.

Awakenings.Name: Heartswitch
Awakenings.Description: Benediction Resonance: Increase Max HP by **10%** for the entire team. Unstackable.

Awakenings.Name: Bless
Awakenings.Description: Benediction Resonance: Increase Max HP by **10%** for the entire team. This effect cannot be stacked. Additionally, increase your Max HP by **10%**. Each time you successfully use the skill while having hyperbody or more than **50%** HP, grant hyperbody to all allies for **8** seconds.

Awakenings.Name: Lin: Epiphyllum Blossom
Awakenings.Description: Increase epiphyllum explosion damage by **15%**.

Awakenings.Name: Lin: Epiphyllum Glamour
Awakenings.Description: Increase epiphyllum explosion damage by **20%**. Reduce all resistance of targets by **7%** upon hit by epiphyllums for **7** seconds. This effect does not stack.

Awakenings.Name: Saki Fuwa: Fortitude State
Awakenings.Description: When HP is lower than **70%**, increase all resistance by **40%**.

Awakenings.Name: Saki Fuwa: Guarding Sword
Awakenings.Description: When HP is lower than **70%**, increase all resistance by **40%** with an extra **60%** increased frost resistance. In the state of Silent Flow: After the sword shadow releases Surge and blocks an attack, the teammate with the lowest HP percentage will get **3** block abilities, not including yourself, lasting for **10** seconds. The maximum blocking damage does not exceed **15%** of the teammate's Max HP.

Awakenings.Name: Dreamcatcher
Awakenings.Description: Increases the flame damage taken by all enemies within **5** meters of Dolly by **8%**. This effect does not stack.

Awakenings.Name: Dolly's Domain
Awakenings.Description: Increases the flame damage received by all enemies within **5** meters of Dolly by **8%**. Not stackable. Increases flame ATK after throwing Dolly by **12%** for **10** seconds. This effect does not stack.

Awakenings.Name: Freeze
Awakenings.Description: Upon entering battle, gain **1.5%** frost ATK boost for **5** seconds every **3** seconds . Stack up to **10** times.

Awakenings.Name: Icebound
Awakenings.Description: Upon entering battle, gain **2.4%** frost ATK boost for **5** seconds every **3** seconds, with up to **10** stacks. Also, gain hyperbody and immunity to control effects while in the Frost Domain.

Awakenings.Name: Nemesis: Metamorphosis
Awakenings.Description: After summoning an Electrode, deal volt damage equal to **60%** of ATK to all enemies within **30** meters of the Electrode and heal all allies (including the user) within its range by **120%** of ATK.

Awakenings.Name: Nemesis: Sublimation
Awakenings.Description: After summoning an Electrode, deal volt damage equal to **100%** of ATK to all enemies within **30** meters of the Electrode and heal all allies (including the user) within its range by **200%** of ATK.

Awakenings.Name: Zero: Accurate Calculation
Awakenings.Description: When Zero uses a weapon skill, reduce cooldown time for Relics in cooldown by **1.5** seconds. Can only activate for the same weapon **1** time every **5** seconds.

Awakenings.Name: Zero: Overall Planning
Awakenings.Description: When Zero uses a weapon skill, reduce cooldown time for Relics in cooldown by **3** seconds. Can only activate for the same weapon **1** time every **5** seconds.

Awakenings.Name: Ene: Fast Mode
Awakenings.Description: When Ene swims, climbs, or glides, reduce endurance consumption by **12%**.

Awakenings.Name: Ene: Beyond Limits Mode
Awakenings.Description: When Ene swims, climbs, or glides, reduce endurance consumption by **20%**.

Awakenings.Name: Meryl: Cool Rose
Awakenings.Description: Reduce frost damage received by Meryl by **20%**, gain immunity to the frostbitten effect, and reduce duration of being frozen by **50%**.

Awakenings.Name: Meryl: Frosted
Awakenings.Description: Reduce frost damage received by Meryl by **25%**, gain immunity to the frostbite effect, and reduce the duration of being frozen by **50%**. The air around Meryl becomes cold, freezing the water around her.

Awakenings.Name: Echo: Uprightness
Awakenings.Description: When teamed up with Echo, allies within **10** meters around Echo gain a damage boost of **4%** (excluding Echo).

Awakenings.Name: Echo: Determination
Awakenings.Description: When teamed up with Echo, allies within **10** meters around Echo gain a damage boost of **6%** (excluding Echo).

Awakenings.Name: Samir: Trickery
Awakenings.Description: Grant **1** stack of Concentration for every **4** seconds when Samir receives no damage. Each stack increases damage dealt by **3%**, and can stack up to **4** times. After being hit, Samir loses **1** stack of Concentration, up to **1** stack per **1** second.

Awakenings.Name: Samir: Shadow
Awakenings.Description: Grant **1** stack of Concentration for every **4** seconds when Samir receives no damage. Each stack increases damage dealt by **4%**, and can stack up to **5** times. After being hit, Samir loses **1** stack of Concentration, up to **1** stack per **2** second.

Awakenings.Name: Huma: Fortitude
Awakenings.Description: Each time Huma receives damage, gain **1** Fortitude mark and gain **1** more Fortitude mark if it is flame damage, up to **1** time per **1** second and **12** stacks in total. Upon using a weapon skill, use all Fortitude marks and gain an HP shield equal to the number of marks ×**0.4%** HP for **12** seconds. If Fortitude marks are used when the effect is stacked up to the maximum, then gain an HP shield equal to the number of marks ×**0.6%** HP.

Awakenings.Name: Huma: Iron Screen
Awakenings.Description: Each time Huma receives damage, gain **1** Fortitude mark and gain **1** more Fortitude mark if it is flame damage, up to **1** time per **1** second and **12** stacks in total. Upon using a weapon skill, use all Fortitude marks and gain an HP shield equal to the number of marks ×**0.6%** HP for **12** seconds. If Fortitude marks are used when the effect is stacked up to the maximum, then gain an HP shield equal to the number of marks ×**0.9%** HP.

Awakenings.Name: Tsubasa: Rainstorm
Awakenings.Description: Each time Tsubasa deals damage, gain **1** stack of Fierce Strike, up to **1** stack per **1** second. Each stack adds **0.5%** ATK, up to **15** stacks. Refreshes effect duration upon gaining the effect again. The effect lasts for **30** seconds.

Awakenings.Name: Tsubasa: Raging Waves
Awakenings.Description: Each time Tsubasa deals damage, gain **1** stack of Fierce Strike, up to **1** stack per **1** second. Each stack adds **0.6%** ATK, up to **30** stacks. Refreshes effect duration upon gaining the effect again. The effect lasts for **30** seconds.

Awakenings.Name: Shiro: Security Alert
Awakenings.Description: When Shiro uses a weapon skill/discharge skill, increase all kinds of ATK by **10%** and physical ATK by an additional **7%** for **8** seconds. Cooldown: **16** seconds.

Awakenings.Name: Shiro: Red Alarm
Awakenings.Description: When Shiro uses a weapon skill/discharge skill, increase all kinds of ATK by **16%** and physical ATK by an additional **10%** for **8** seconds. Cooldown: **16** seconds.

Awakenings.Name: KING: Coldblooded Swipe
Awakenings.Description: Every **7** enemies defeated by KING restore HP equal to **8%** of Max HP.

Awakenings.Name: KING: Fear Reaper
Awakenings.Description: Every **5** enemies defeated by KING restore HP equal to **10%** of Max HP.

Awakenings.Name: Cobalt-B: Lingering Warmth
Awakenings.Description: After Cobalt-B uses her discharge skill, restore a random amount of weapon charge between **50** to **120** points.

Awakenings.Name: Cobalt-B: Sparks
Awakenings.Description: After Cobalt-B uses her discharge skill, restore a random amount of weapon charge between **90** to **180** points.

Awakenings.Name: Cocoritter: Assistance
Awakenings.Description: When Cocoritter uses a support weapon, increase healing effects she inflicts on others and receives by **20%**.

Awakenings.Name: Cocoritter: Trust
Awakenings.Description: When Cocoritter uses a support weapon, increase healing and healing received by **20%**. And when Cocoritter uses a support-type weapon's discharge skill or weapon skill, increase nearby allies' ATK by **15%** for **5** seconds.

Awakenings.Name: Claudia: Blink
Awakenings.Description: Go invisible for **1** second upon dodging.

Awakenings.Name: Claudia: Shadow
Awakenings.Description: Go invisible for **1.5** seconds upon dodging.

Awakenings.Name: Crow: Loner
Awakenings.Description: When Crow is not in a team, increase damage dealt by **6%** and reduce damage received by **4%**.

Awakenings.Name: Crow: Silent Night
Awakenings.Description: When Crow is not in a team, increase damage dealt by **10%** and reduce damage received by **6%**. When Crow enters combat, increase damage dealt by **12%** for **12** seconds.

Awakenings.Name: Pepper: Revival
Awakenings.Description: When Pepper spends satiety to restore HP, increase restoration effect by **100%**.

Awakenings.Name: Pepper: Source
Awakenings.Description: When Pepper spends satiety to restore HP, increase restoration effect by **200%**.

Awakenings.Name: Hilda: Pedal to the Metal
Awakenings.Description: When Hilda uses a vehicle, increase speed by **7%**.

Awakenings.Name: Hilda: Full-speed Drifting
Awakenings.Description: When Hilda uses a vehicle, increase speed by **10%**.

Awakenings.Name: Bai Ling: Valor
Awakenings.Description: When Bai Ling puts the Glider or the Jetboard away, increase speed by **8%** for **12** seconds. Cooldown: **60** seconds.

Awakenings.Name: Bai Ling: Resoluteness
Awakenings.Description: When Bai Ling puts the Glider or the Jetboard away, increase speed by **15%** for **12** seconds. Cooldown: **60** seconds.
